mean_cn: n. 索价低于常价，充电不足；  vi. 向…少收钱；  vt. 向…少收钱
mean_en: to charge (someone) too little for something :to ask (someone) to pay too little money for something
word_etyma:
under 不足、少 + charge充电，费用 → vt. 充电不足；索价低于常价；弹药装填不足
n. 充电不足；低的索价；填不够量的火药
sentence: The store undercharges for its clothes; they actually lose money.
sentence_trans: 那个商店收少了衣服的钱；他们实际上在亏钱。
